subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Carmelo Anthony scored 31 points as the Knicks bounced back from a rare loss with a victory at Cleveland, moving the Knicks closer to the coveted second seed in the Eastern Conference.
snippet: Carmelo Anthony scored 31 points as the Knicks bounced back from a rare loss with a victory at Cleveland, moving the Knicks closer to the coveted second seed in the Eastern Conference.
